title: Unknown Error, can't get into games
body: So for the past two nights logging on to LoL/joining a queue is very slow/laggy and more often than not comes up with an error message saying "unknown error", which then removes me from champ select. My internet browser works fine, and my net speed is good, these issues on League came out of the blue. I've tried restarting the router, cleaning/scanning my comp...help pls :(

replies.body:
Hey,

What's your ISP, and where are you located?

Can you paste the results of traceroute 192.64.169.20?

Cheers
Mindstar

Hi guys, 

We're going to consolidate all discussion on this into [this thread](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/TARTxsI1-connection-stability-issues-10092015).

Cheers
Mindstar

Internode and tasmania

i have no idea what i'm looking at :\

Itrs basically the links between you and your ISP and the Riot servers.
First HOP is your router the second your closest DSLAM and then for me connection ton next major DSLAM (im guessing)
SO it goes Router -> closest DSLAM (Hobart) for me -> Mel -> Syd
Looks like a breakdown between Mel and syd and I am not sure why there is so many other hops, ISP or Riot routing?
Woah, quick responses, cheers :) I'm with TPG, and I'm in Canberra, Australia. No clue what traceroute is/does, sorry...
pvp net wasn't connecting either, but seems to be ok again? Riot techies got on to it fast?

An unknown error has occurred.  So far i pick match making > confirm yes after is pops > game hangs > ban for not confirming yes (this is only after 1 attempt). Next log in leagues is not realizing i have a lvl 30 account so i am unable to select ranked and i have no champions in my roster (i have them all).
Same problem here. Forever getting the connecting to server error. When in champ select shows everyone disconnected. Can't complain though it is typical of the OCE server.
pretty annoying, i've never had this issue before and i'm not tech-savvy enough to figure it out on my own haha

I am pretty tech savy. But I don't believe it is our end. Unless flushing the dns will work. I know Riot did sever maintenance early this morning not sure if that had any impact as it was working last night at 2:30am.
My client sort of went back to normal after 1am, i played a couple games and that felt normal. could it be my firewall?

If it was your firewall I would expect you to not get any connection at all (when trying to login)
I am haing the same issue so still convinced its Riots side.
hope it gets resolved soon, this is maddening
